mapper.select:
/* Integer studentId,String name,String identifyNo*/ /*学号(studentId),学生姓名(NAME)，身份证号(identifyNo)，专业(profess)，班级(class)，入学时间(enroTime)，联系电话(telNo)，已修学分(credit)*/
SELECT studentId,NAME name,identifyNo,profess,class studentClass,enroTime,telNo,credit from myssproject.student
studentId like concat('%',#{studentId},'%')
and name like concat('%',#{name},'%')
and identifyNo like concat('%',#{identifyNo},'%')
